Html:
Hello,

Chirpy is fantastic, but i cannot use it!

i work in a corporate with an internal proxy.

With the proxy chirpy not work, could you add the setting in the next build?

(proxyname, proxypassword, proxydomani, proxyusername, proxypassword)

Thank you

Francesco

All engine work offline, except google closure compiler.

In last version you have setting for activate google closure compiler offline.
